attributes.name: Bone-riddled Robes
attributes.description: "Bones are draped on all edges of this robe, a clear indication that it is used for some nefarious ritual."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bones are draped on all edges of this robe, a clear indication that it is used for some nefarious ritual."

attributes.name: Boots of Channeled Energy
attributes.description: "These boots seem to draw energy from the living things around you."
attributes.parsed_description: "These boots seem to draw energy from the living things around you."

attributes.name: Boots of Heroic Sacrifices
attributes.description: "The most selfish among us are capable of the most selfless acts in moments of peril."
attributes.parsed_description: "The most selfish among us are capable of the most selfless acts in moments of peril."

attributes.name: Boots of Stallion
attributes.description: "On a stallion shod with fire; And the winds are left behind In the speed of my desire"
attributes.parsed_description: "On a stallion shod with fire; And the winds are left behind In the speed of my desire"

attributes.description: Gloves with bows on them.
attributes.parsed_description: Gloves with bows on them.
